text: Guatteria panamensis is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to Panama. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Mitré, M. 1998. Guatteria panamensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. Category:Endemic flora of Panama panamensis Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Guatteria panamensis
